pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: ほとんどの観光客がカメラを持参している。
lessons.english: Almost every tourist carries a camera with him.

lessons.japanese: いっぱい入ったコップ持参しなければならない。
lessons.english: You must bring the full glass with you.

lessons.japanese: 今週は弁当を持参する。
lessons.english: I think I'll brown bag it this week.
